name: SAPWaterPlanter
0:
”Alexa open sap water planter”
”water the plant now”
”stop watering the plant”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sap water planter
des: The purpose of this skill is to ease people who have plants at home and may be busy with their jobs. Therefore, with this skill, it allows the person to water the plant by scheduling the time of when they will water the plant. Also, they have the option to manually water any amount and stopping it.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
